attributes.action: Ban the sale of air rifles knives and imitation guns from markets and car boot sales and make their sale illegal at such sites.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the view of the current high levels of inner city violence it seems wrong that these weapons of violence can easily be found on local markets .

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
